title: Events
description: A list of game events, including triggers, choices, and presentation details.

name.title: Name
name.description: Used for triggering via 'Triggers a [event] event' unique.

presentation.description: Alert indicates a regular popup, None means the choice is made randomly, Floating is for tutorial-style indicators.

choices.title: Choices
choices.description: User can choose to trigger one of the viable choices.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text that is displayed to the user for the choice.

keyShortcut.title: Keyboard Shortcut
keyShortcut.description: The key that would invoke the given choice. See https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/master/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/Input.java
